mapper.select:
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(A.SETLE_PNTTM, '%Y-%c-%e') AS SETLE_PNTTM , A.SETLE_TOT_AMOUNT , A.SETLE_STTUS_CODE , B.ORDER_NO , B.SBSCRPT_CYCLE_SE_CODE , B.SBSCRPT_WEEK_CYCLE , B.SBSCRPT_DLVY_WD , B.SBSCRPT_MT_CYCLE , B.SBSCRPT_DLVY_DAY , B.DLVY_ADRES , B.DLVY_STTUS_CODE , (SELECT API_ID FROM STN_HDRY_CMPNY WHERE HDRY_ID = B.HDRY_ID) AS HDRY_ID , B.HDRY_DLVY_DE , B.INVC_NO , C.ORDER_NO , C.ORDER_CO , C.ORDRR_ID , C.ORDER_KND_CODE , C.SBSCRPT_CYCLE_SE_CODE , C.SBSCRPT_WEEK_CYCLE , C.SBSCRPT_DLVY_WD , C.SBSCRPT_USE_WEEK , C.SBSCRPT_MT_CYCLE , C.SBSCRPT_USE_MT , C.SBSCRPT_DLVY_DAY , D.GOODS_PC , D.GOODS_NM , D.MODEL_NM ,CONCAT( IF(ISNULL(H.GOODS_CTGRY_NM) or H.GOODS_CTGRY_NM = 'ROOT','',E.GOODS_CTGRY_NM), IF(ISNULL(H.GOODS_CTGRY_NM) or H.GOODS_CTGRY_NM = 'ROOT','','>'), IF(ISNULL(G.GOODS_CTGRY_NM) or G.GOODS_CTGRY_NM = 'ROOT','',G.GOODS_CTGRY_NM), IF(ISNULL(G.GOODS_CTGRY_NM) or G.GOODS_CTGRY_NM = 'ROOT','','>'), IF(ISNULL(E.GOODS_CTGRY_NM) or E.GOODS_CTGRY_NM = 'ROOT','',E.GOODS_CTGRY_NM) ) AS GOODS_CTGRY_NM FROM STN_ORDER_SETLE A JOIN STN_ORDER_DLVY B ON A.ORDER_SETLE_NO = B.ORDER_SETLE_NO JOIN STN_ORDER C ON B.ORDER_NO = C.ORDER_NO AND C.USE_AT = 'Y' JOIN STN_GOODS D ON C.GOODS_ID = D.GOODS_ID AND D.USE_AT = 'Y' JOIN STN_GOODS_CTGRY E ON D.GOODS_CTGRY_ID = E.GOODS_CTGRY_ID AND E.USE_AT = 'Y' JOIN STN_PRTNR_CMPNY_MAPNG F ON D.PCMAPNG_ID = F.PCMAPNG_ID LEFT JOIN STN_GOODS_CTGRY G ON G.GOODS_CTGRY_ID = E.UPPER_GOODS_CTGRY_ID AND G.USE_AT = 'Y' LEFT JOIN STN_GOODS_CTGRY H ON H.GOODS_CTGRY_ID = G.UPPER_GOODS_CTGRY_ID AND H.USE_AT = 'Y'
ORDER BY A.ORDER_SETLE_NO DESC LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM STN_ORDER_SETLE A JOIN STN_ORDER_DLVY B ON A.ORDER_SETLE_NO = B.ORDER_SETLE_NO JOIN STN_ORDER C ON B.ORDER_NO = C.ORDER_NO AND C.USE_AT = 'Y' JOIN STN_GOODS D ON C.GOODS_ID = D.GOODS_ID AND D.USE_AT = 'Y' JOIN STN_GOODS_CTGRY E ON D.GOODS_CTGRY_ID = E.GOODS_CTGRY_ID AND E.USE_AT = 'Y' JOIN STN_PRTNR_CMPNY_MAPNG F ON D.PCMAPNG_ID = F.PCMAPNG_ID

SELECT A.ORDER_SETLE_NO , A.SETLE_POINT , A.SETLE_CARD_AMOUNT , A.SETLE_TOT_AMOUNT , A.SETLE_TY_CODE , A.SETLE_STTUS_CODE , A.SETLE_RESULT_CODE , A.SETLE_RESULT_TY_CODE , A.SETLE_RESULT_MSSAGE , A.EZW_SETLE_CONFM_NO , A.INI_SETLE_CONFM_NO , A.SETLE_PRARNDE , DATE_FORMAT(A.SETLE_PNTTM, '%Y-%c-%e') AS SETLE_PNTTM , A.TEMP_KEY , A.USE_AT FROM STN_ORDER_SETLE A WHERE A.TEMP_KEY = #{tempKey}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STN_ORDER_DLVY ( ORDER_NO ,ORDER_SETLE_NO ,ORDER_KND_CODE ,SBSCRPT_CYCLE_SE_CODE ,SBSCRPT_WEEK_CYCLE ,SBSCRPT_DLVY_WD ,SBSCRPT_MT_CYCLE ,SBSCRPT_DLVY_DAY ,ORDER_ODR ,ORDER_CO ,SLE_AMOUNT ,SETLE_AMOUNT ,GOODS_AMOUNT ,OPTN_AMOUNT ,DLVY_AMOUNT ,DLVY_USER_NM ,TELNO ,DLVY_ZIP ,DLVY_ADRES ,DLVY_ADRES_DETAIL ,DLVY_MSSAGE ,DLVY_STTUS_CODE ,HDRY_ID ,HDRY_DLVY_DE ,INVC_NO ,REGIST_PNTTM ,ORDER_REQ_STTUS_CODE ,DSCNT_AMOUNT ,ORDER_INFO ) SELECT #{orderNo} ,#{orderSetleNo} ,o.ORDER_KND_CODE ,o.SBSCRPT_CYCLE_SE_CODE ,o.SBSCRPT_WEEK_CYCLE ,o.SBSCRPT_DLVY_WD ,o.SBSCRPT_MT_CYCLE ,o.SBSCRPT_DLVY_DAY ,o.NOW_ODR ,o.ORDER_CO ,o.TOT_AMOUNT ,o.TOT_AMOUNT-IFNULL(o.DSCNT_AMOUNT,0) ,o.GOODS_AMOUNT ,IFNULL(SUM(i.GITEM_PC),0) ,o.DLVY_AMOUNT+IFNULL(o.ISLAND_DLVY_AMOUNT,0) ,o.DLVY_USER_NM ,o.TELNO ,o.DLVY_ZIP ,o.DLVY_ADRES ,o.DLVY_ADRES_DETAIL ,o.DLVY_MSSAGE ,IFNULL(#{dlvySttusCode},'DLVY01') ,h.HDRY_ID ,NULL ,NULL ,SYSDATE() ,#{orderReqSttusCode} ,#{dscntPc} ,#{orderInfo} FROM STN_ORDER o JOIN STN_GOODS g ON g.GOODS_ID = o.GOODS_ID AND g.USE_AT = 'Y' JOIN STN_ORDER_ITEM i ON i.ORDER_NO = o.ORDER_NO JOIN STN_PRTNR_CMPNY_MAPNG p ON p.PCMAPNG_ID = g.PCMAPNG_ID AND p.USE_AT ='Y' JOIN STN_CMPNY c ON c.CMPNY_ID = p.CMPNY_ID AND c.USE_AT = 'Y' JOIN STN_CMPNY_HDRY_MAPNG hm ON hm.CMPNY_ID = c.CMPNY_ID JOIN STN_HDRY_CMPNY h ON h.HDRY_ID = hm.HDRY_ID AND h.USE_AT = 'Y' WHERE o.ORDER_NO = #{orderNo} AND o.USE_AT = 'Y' LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE STN_ORDER_SETLE a INNER JOIN ( SELECT os.ORDER_SETLE_NO ,CASE c.STDE_SE_CODE WHEN 'STDE04' THEN CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(SETLE_PNTTM + interval 1 month, '%Y%m'), DATE_FORMAT(LAST_DAY(os.SETLE_PNTTM + interval 1 month),'%d')) WHEN 'STDE05' THEN CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(SETLE_PNTTM, '%e') <= 15 THEN (LAST_DAY(SETLE_PNTTM - interval 1 month) + interval 1 DAY) + interval 3 week + interval (2 - DAYOFWEEK((LAST_DAY(SETLE_PNTTM - interval 1 month) + interval 1 DAY) + interval 3 week)) + 1 day ELSE (LAST_DAY(SETLE_PNTTM - interval 1 month) + interval 1 DAY) + interval 1 MONTH + interval 1 WEEK + interval (2 - DAYOFWEEK((LAST_DAY(SETLE_PNTTM - interval 1 month) + interval 1 DAY) + interval 1 MONTH + interval 1 WEEK)) + 1 day END END EXCCLC_PRARNDE FROM STN_ORDER_SETLE os JOIN STN_ORDER_DLVY od ON od.ORDER_SETLE_NO = os.ORDER_SETLE_NO JOIN STN_ORDER o ON o.ORDER_NO = od.ORDER_NO JOIN STN_GOODS g ON g.GOODS_ID = o.GOODS_ID JOIN STN_PRTNR_CMPNY_MAPNG pcm ON pcm.PCMAPNG_ID = g.PCMAPNG_ID JOIN STN_CMPNY c ON c.CMPNY_ID = pcm.CMPNY_ID WHERE os.SETLE_STTUS_CODE = 'S' AND os.ORDER_SETLE_NO = #{orderSetleNo} GROUP BY os.ORDER_SETLE_NO ) b ON b.ORDER_SETLE_NO = b.ORDER_SETLE_NO SET a.EXCCLC_PRARNDE = b.EXCCLC_PRARNDE WHERE a.ORDER_SETLE_NO = #{orderSetleNo}
mapper.select: SELECT A.* , C.ORDER_SETLE_NO , IFNULL(C.SETLE_POINT, 0) AS SETLE_POINT , C.SETLE_CARD_AMOUNT , C.SETLE_TOT_AMOUNT , C.SETLE_TY_CODE , C.SETLE_STTUS_CODE , C.SETLE_RESULT_CODE , C.SETLE_RESULT_MSSAGE , C.EZW_SETLE_CONFM_NO , C.INI_SETLE_CONFM_NO , C.SETLE_PRARNDE , C.SETLE_PNTTM , C.USE_AT , E.PRTNR_ID FROM STN_ORDER A JOIN STN_ORDER_DLVY B ON A.ORDER_NO = B.ORDER_NO JOIN STN_ORDER_SETLE C ON B.ORDER_SETLE_NO = C.ORDER_SETLE_NO JOIN STN_GOODS D ON A.GOODS_ID = D.GOODS_ID JOIN STN_PRTNR_CMPNY_MAPNG E ON D.PCMAPNG_ID = E.PCMAPNG_ID WHERE C.SETLE_STTUS_CODE = 'S' AND C.SETLE_TY_CODE='EZP' AND B.REQ_TY_CODE != 'R05' AND A.ORDER_GROUP_NO = #{orderGroupNo}

SELECT * FROM STN_ORDER A JOIN STN_ORDER_DLVY B ON A.ORDER_NO = B.ORDER_NO JOIN STN_ORDER_SETLE C ON B.ORDER_SETLE_NO = C.ORDER_SETLE_NO LEFT JOIN STN_ORDER_ITEM soi on A.ORDER_NO = soi.ORDER_NO WHERE B.ORDER_DLVY_NO = (SELECT MAX(ORDER_DLVY_NO) FROM STN_ORDER_DLVY AA JOIN STN_ORDER_SETLE BB ON AA.ORDER_SETLE_NO = BB.ORDER_SETLE_NO WHERE AA.ORDER_NO = #{orderNo} AND BB.SETLE_STTUS_CODE = 'S')
mapper.update:
UPDATE STN_ORDER_SETLE s
SETLE_PNTTM = SYSDATE(),
SETLE_STTUS_CODE = #{setleSttusCode},
SETLE_RESULT_CODE = #{setleResultCode},
SETLE_PRARNDE = #{setlePrarnde},
SETLE_TOT_AMOUNT = (SELECT o.TOT_AMOUNT+o.DSCNT_AMOUNT FROM STN_ORDER o JOIN STN_ORDER_DLVY d ON o.ORDER_NO = d.ORDER_NO WHERE d.ORDER_SETLE_NO = #{orderSetleNo}),
WHERE ORDER_SETLE_NO = #{orderSetleNo}
mapper.select:
SELECT SUM(X.MONEY) AS CONFIRM_PRICE FROM (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(A.SETLE_CARD_AMOUNT), 0) AS MONEY FROM STN_ORDER_SETLE A JOIN STN_ORDER_DLVY B ON A.ORDER_SETLE_NO = B.ORDER_SETLE_NO JOIN STN_ORDER C ON B.ORDER_NO = C.ORDER_NO WHERE C.ORDER_GROUP_NO = #{orderGroupNo} AND A.INI_SETLE_CONFM_NO = #{iniSetleConfmNo} AND A.SETLE_STTUS_CODE = 'S'
UNION ALL
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(A.SETLE_CARD_AMOUNT), 0) * -1 AS MONEY FROM STN_ORDER_SETLE A JOIN STN_ORDER_DLVY B ON A.ORDER_SETLE_NO = B.ORDER_SETLE_NO JOIN STN_ORDER C ON B.ORDER_NO = C.ORDER_NO WHERE C.ORDER_NO = #{orderNo} AND A.INI_SETLE_CONFM_NO = #{iniSetleConfmNo} AND A.SETLE_STTUS_CODE = 'S' ) X

SELECT A.* , C.ORDER_SETLE_NO , IFNULL(C.SETLE_POINT, 0) AS SETLE_POINT , C.SETLE_CARD_AMOUNT , C.SETLE_TOT_AMOUNT , C.SETLE_TY_CODE , C.SETLE_STTUS_CODE , C.SETLE_RESULT_CODE , C.SETLE_RESULT_MSSAGE , C.EZW_SETLE_CONFM_NO , C.INI_SETLE_CONFM_NO , C.SETLE_PRARNDE , C.SETLE_PNTTM , C.USE_AT , E.PRTNR_ID FROM STN_ORDER A JOIN STN_ORDER_DLVY B ON A.ORDER_NO = B.ORDER_NO JOIN STN_ORDER_SETLE C ON B.ORDER_SETLE_NO = C.ORDER_SETLE_NO JOIN STN_GOODS D ON A.GOODS_ID = D.GOODS_ID JOIN STN_PRTNR_CMPNY_MAPNG E ON D.PCMAPNG_ID = E.PCMAPNG_ID WHERE C.SETLE_STTUS_CODE = 'S' AND C.SETLE_TY_CODE='CARD' AND B.REQ_TY_CODE != 'R05' AND A.ORDER_GROUP_NO = #{orderGroupNo}

UPDATE STN_ORDER_SETLE SET SETLE_STTUS_CODE='T' WHERE SETLE_STTUS_CODE = 'R' AND ORDER_SETLE_NO = (SELECT MAX(B.ORDER_SETLE_NO) FROM STN_ORDER A JOIN STN_ORDER_DLVY B ON A.ORDER_NO = B.ORDER_NO WHERE A.ORDER_NO=#{orderNo})

SELECT * FROM STN_ORDER_SETLE A JOIN STN_ORDER_DLVY B ON A.ORDER_SETLE_NO = B.ORDER_SETLE_NO JOIN STN_ORDER C ON B.ORDER_NO = C.ORDER_NO WHERE C.ORDER_NO = #{orderNo} AND B.ORDER_DLVY_NO = (SELECT MAX(ORDER_DLVY_NO) FROM STN_ORDER_DLVY WHERE ORDER_NO = #{orderNo})

SELECT A.* FROM STN_ORDER_SETLE A JOIN STN_ORDER_DLVY B ON A.ORDER_SETLE_NO = B.ORDER_SETLE_NO JOIN STN_ORDER C ON B.ORDER_NO = C.ORDER_NO WHERE C.ORDER_NO = #{orderNo} AND B.ORDER_DLVY_NO >= #{orderDlvyNo} ORDER BY B.ORDER_DLVY_NO DESC, A.ORDER_SETLE_NO DESC LIMIT 2
